entry.title: Amid further shooting, Armenia calls on Baku to cease escalation

media:group.media:title: Amid further shooting, Armenia calls on Baku to cease escalation
media:group.media:description:
๐ The head of the Council of Europe expressed the organizationโs support for Armeniaโs reform process on a visit yesterday to Yerevan. ๐ Days of shooting from Azerbaijan along the Armenian border continued last night as villages were hit in the vicinity of Goris. ๐ No final decision has been made on whether Armenia-Azerbaijan border delimitation will start from the Tavush region. ๐ Watch More: Interview with Baroness Caroline Cox- https://youtu.be/iCJRzkWB-xE

entry.title: Baroness Cox's Lifelong Mission for Nagorno-Karabakh

media:group.media:title: Baroness Cox's Lifelong Mission for Nagorno-Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
โA voice for people whose voices are not heard.โ Thatโs how Humanitarian activist and long-time advocate for Artsakh, Baroness Caroline Cox, talks about how she used her privileged position as a member of the UK House of Lords. In that capacity, she made over 90 trips to Nagorno-Karabakh in order to raise international awareness and support humanitarian initiatives. She discusses her steadfast commitment to promoting human rights, justice, and durable solutions for the region's people. โI hope Iโll be able to go back with them,โ she says.

entry.title: What can be done to safeguard the cultural heritage in Karabakh

media:group.media:title: What can be done to safeguard the cultural heritage in Karabakh
media:group.media:description:
Following the 2023 ethnic cleansing of Armenians from Artsakh, Baku has already began erasing any trace of Armenians in the region. Azerbaijani social media is already rife with videos depicting the destruction of Armenian heritage sites. In this report, CivilNet explores the background of the cultural heritage destruction in Artsakh and asks what steps can be taken to prevent complete erasure.

entry.title: 80-ีกีดีตีก ีฏีซีถีจ ีีฅีฒีธึีด ีฃีธึีฃีกีฃีธึีฎีกีฏีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถ ีง ีขีกึีฅีฌ, ีฅึีกีฆีธึีด ีง ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีฟีฅีฒีฅึ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีฅีฌ

media:group.media:description:
ีีฅีฒ ีฃีตีธึีฒีซ ีขีถีกีฏีซีน 80-ีกีดีตีก ีีกีฝีดีซีฏ ิฒีกีฒีคีกีฝีกึีตีกีถีจ ีฃีธึีฃีกีฃีธึีฎีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถ ีง ีขีกึีฅีฌึ ีีกีดีกีตีถึีกีบีฅีฟีกึีกีถีซ ึ ีขีกึีฅึีกึีถีฅึีซ ึ ีฃีถีธึีฉีตีกีดีข ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีจ ีฐีกีดีกีฌึีพีฅีฌ ีง ีกีถีฐึีกีชีฅีทีฟ ีฃีธึีฎีซึีถีฅึีธีพ ึ ีถีตีธึีฉีฅึีธีพึ ีีถีกีตีกีฎ ีฏีซีถีถ ีกึีคีฅีถ 17 ีกีทีกีฏีฅึีฟ ีธึีถีซ, ีขีกีตึ ีฅึีกีฆีธึีด ีง ีฏีฅีถีฟึีธีถีจ ีฆีกึีฃีกึีถีฅีฌีธึ, ีทีกีฟ ีบีกีฟีพีฅึีถีฅึ ีธึีถีฅีถีกีฌีธึ ึ ีฃีตีธึีฒีซ ีฏีกีถีกีถึ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีฟีฅีฒีฅึีธีพ ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีฅีฌีธึ ีดีกีฝีซีถึ

media:group.media:description:
Le docteur Kevork Georges Kรฉpรฉnรฉkian, chirurgien urologue et ancien maire de Lyon รฉtait l'invitรฉ de CivilNet. Depuis 1987, le mรฉdecin se rend frรฉquemment en Armรฉnie pour des missions mรฉdicales. Depuis plus de 35 ans, il a vu comment l'Armรฉnie a รฉvoluรฉ dans sa direction politique. Le Dr. Kรฉpรฉnรฉkian, engagรฉ dans la diaspora, รฉvoque le lien rompu entre les Armรฉniens qui vivent en dehors des frontiรจres de l'Armรฉnie et le gouvernement armรฉnien.

ิตึึีกีถีซ ีฐีกีดีกึ ีฏีกีฝีฏีกีฎีฅีฌีซ ึ ีดีธึีฉ ีฃีธึีฎีกึึีถีฅึีธีพ ีฎีกีผีฅึ ีฅีถ ีฃีถีพีฅีฌ, ีซีฝีฏ ีกีฝึีกีฌีฟีกีบีกีฟีดีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟีธึีด ึีธีฒีฅึีซ ีฌีพีกึีธึีด ีง ีฟีฅีฒีซ ีธึีถีฅีถีธึีด. ีถีทีธึีด ีง ิตึึีกีถีซ ีกีพีกีฃีกีถีธึ ีกีถีคีกีด, ยซิฑีฆีฃีกีตีซีถ ีกีผีกีปีจีถีฉีกึยป ีฏีธึีฝีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฒีฅีฏีกีพีกึ ีีกีตีฏ ิณึีซีฃีธึีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีีก ีพีฝีฟีกีฐ ีง, ีธึ ีกีฝึีกีฌีฟีกีบีกีฟีดีกีถ ีธีฌีธึีฟีธึีด ีฃีธึีดีกึีถีฅึ ีฅีถ ีฃึีบีกีถีพีธึีดโค ีคึีกีถีซึ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีซ ีธึีกีฏีถ ีง ีฟีธึีชีธึีด ึ, ีธึีบีฅีฝ ีฏีกีถีธีถ, ีฐีกีปีธึีค ีฟีกึีซ ีถีธึีตีถ ึีธีฒีธึีถีฅึีจ ีพีฅึีกีถีธึีธีฃีดีกีถ ีฏีกึีซึ ีฅีถ ีธึีถีฅีถีธึีด:
